fullText: Like Back to the Future: The Musical, which just opened a few blocks away, The Shark Is Broken depends on your own affection for the property to make sense.

keyPhrases.quote: depends on your own affection for the property to make sense
Like Back to the Future: The Musical, which just opened a few blocks away
depends on your own affection for the property

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: This excerpt suggests the show only works if you're already a fan of the source material, which is a conditional and lukewarm assessment that neither recommends nor dismisses the show outright. | GPT-4o-mini: The review suggests that enjoyment of the show is contingent on personal attachment to the source material, indicating a mixed recommendation.
